department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Catalan Language and Culture: a Multimedia Approach
course.faculty_text: Stacey Katz Bourns and members of the Department
course.description: Intermediate course introducing students to Catalan culture and boosting their oral and written skills through a wide range of resources, such as Internet, television, radio, and press. Students will get a taste of various aspects of Catalan culture: art, cinema, music, literature, traditions, cuisine, history, and more.
course.prerequisites: Catalan Ba, basic knowledge of Catalan, or permission of course head.
course.notes: Conducted in Catalan. Not open to auditors. May not be taken Pass/Fail by undergraduates, but may be taken Sat/Unsat by GSAS students.
